name: Jinxed Christmas
description:
This is my entry for the Secret Santa Jam 2022.

Story

Jinx the cat has been very naughty this year.

To make up for it she has to help Santa deliver presents on Christmas Eve.

Instructions

For controls you can use the arrow keys, WASD, ZQSD or IJKL.

Press left and right to move left and right.

Press up to jump.

Press down to throw away a present if it is not the correct one.

On the left and right there are many presents to collect.

Santa will give you instructions on which present to collect.

Take any valid present and bring it to the top to give it to santa.
